level.text: The provisions of chapter 21 do not apply to the USN District.
There shall be no minimum number of automobile parking spaces required in the USN District.
No lease or purchase agreement for a dwelling unit may include within its terms the sale or lease of an automobile parking space.
Automobile parking spaces need not be located on the same lot with the building or building unit they are intended to serve, but must be located on a lot within or below the USN District.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4788, 4800 (June 3, 2011).
